name: cloudflare-engineer
description: Platform Architect capabilities for Cloudflare - architecture design with Workers + Assets, Isolates vs Containers decision tree, D1 row read protection, R2 Class B caching, observability export (Axiom/Better Stack), Loop Protection, and billing safety. Includes Edge-Native Constraints, Vibecoder Proactive Safeguards, Zero Trust, SSL for SaaS, media streaming patterns, recursion guards, queue safety, and cost simulation.
